definition: extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve
unsigned remainder (i.e. the remainder after rounding to the nearest integer)
pinyin: yu2 liu2 wu2 fu2 hao4 shu4

sentences.english: A harmonious wine with a long, fruity and spicyfinish.
sentences.chinese: 回味和谐悠长，余留果味和辛香。

sentences.english: Scotch taped the remaining windscreen and carrying on.
sentences.chinese: 用胶布粘牢余留的挡风玻璃，继续前进。

sentences.english: That is a kind of intense emotion later on remaining stay of ashes.
sentences.chinese: 那是一种激情过后所余留的灰烬。

sentences.english: At this stage of our evolution, they’re little more than remnants.
sentences.chinese: 我们进化到这一阶段，它们顶多是进化的余留物罢了。

sentences.english: Will is nothing but the last appetite or aversion remaining in deliberation.
sentences.chinese: 意志无非是深思熟虑中最后余留的欲求或厌恶。

sentences.english: The remaining members of the group convinced the leader to return to England to get help.
sentences.chinese: 这个团队中余留的成员说服首领返回英格兰寻求帮助。

sentences.english: Coordination also applies to the remaining two items, which are operational.
sentences.chinese: 协调还适用于余留的两个业务性项目。

sentences.english: There is plenty of work left till the next start.
sentences.chinese: 在下一次开始前仍有诸多余留的工作。

definition: to dissipate everywhere (of light, sound, gas etc)
seriously ill and about to die
to gather/to rake together/to pile up
